event.title: caused by the virus at Women and Children's Hospital on Saturday morning

data.event: Maya Harden died from complications caused by the virus at Women and Children's Hospital on Saturday morning.

event.title: had been admitted to Children's Hospital on June 16

data.event: According to WIVB Channel 4, Harden who attended 4th grade at Buffalo Science Magnet School 59, had been admitted to Children's Hospital on June 16, where she remained on life support until her death.

event.title: June 20, a 15-year-old boy also from Buffalo, died

data.event: On June 20, a 15-year-old boy also from Buffalo, died at the same hospital, and developing pneumonia.
